attributes.action: create an additional online House of Parliment. Where the people can represent themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think we should create an online House of Parliment. Individual avatars (aka representatives) for an individualistic age. The Lords only represent themselves ( they dont represent a constituency), why cant we also represent ourselves in an Online House of parilment. 
Goverment and parilment are unrepresentative in general. There are no chavs in parilment. If parilment is unrepresentative then it's policies will also be.
There is no longer a need to send representatives to a building in physical space when we can represent ourselves in a construction in digital space. This does not replace any houses of parilment which are existing but just adds another. Niether does it negate the need for paid politicians.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
